titles: The crafty barber of Debtford You Debtford women all beware of this same crafty barber: for when he gets between your arms there he takes up his harbour. Tune of, Daniel Cooper.
publisher: Printed for John Clark Junior, at the Horshoo in West Smithfield.,
notes: Verse: "Come and hear my pleasant song ..."
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
keywords: Broadsides --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
